name: Project Escapism (Demo)
description:
An introverted young woman wakes up in a strange world of anomaly after a tragic event. She must venture across the world collecting memory pieces in order to recover in the waking world.

 [This is currently in a demo but playable state atm. It contains a small town to explore along with a couple on-screen battles present in this version. ]

(A story-driven action rpg utilizing KageDesu's "Action Battle System" bringing in on-screen battles. This is my first ever independent game project that uses art assets created by yours truly, so any helpful feedback is greatly appreciated for further improvements.)

Total Runtime: 30-45 minutes (if you interact with everything)

* Plugins belong to: TeamStella, Galv, Casper Gaming, & Moghunter. Alpha ABS Z plugin belongs to KageDusu.
* Intro Song "Desolation": Made by Me
* In-Game Music: Darren Curtis (Royalty-Free)
